item.description: Hey folks, Great Brook does not have enough snow, but Gunstock does! Let's meet at 10:30 at their ticket counter, to get there on time leave Boston by 7:30 AM. I have three seats free in my car, happy to drive up anyone. Carpooling is encouraged, a convenient spot to meet is the commuter lot at exit 47 on 93 in Methuen, just north of 495 interchange. If you meet there at 8:30 you would be in Gunstock on time. Back in Boston by 6:30 PM if we leave Gunstock at 3:30. I'm going to do the Back Country Ridge, so anyone wanting back country can come with me, others can ski the groomed trails.
item.how_to_find_us: Lets figure out how to carpool

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Gunstock
